author: Gabrielle Reyes, Gabrielle Reyes
title: Peru: Police Arrest Chinese Man for Illegal Coronavirus Testing
description: Police in Lima arrested a Chinese citizen for illegally conducting rapid coronavirus tests on the public with testing kits stolen from Peru's health ministry, Singapore's CNA reported on Monday.
content:
Police in Lima arrested a Chinese citizen for illegally conducting rapid coronavirus tests on the public with testing kits stolen from Peru’s health ministry, Singapore’s CNA reported on Monday.
Zhang Tianxing, 36, was arrested on Sunday in the Brena distric… [+3488 chars]
